title: Similarities, differences in causes of revolutions

content.question: Directions: You are to answer the following question. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis and supports that thesis with appropriate historical evidence. Addresses all parts of the question. Makes direct, relevant comparisons. Analyzes relevant reasons for similarities and differences. Analyze similarities and differences in the causes of TWO of the following revolutions. American Revolution (1775–1781) French Revolution (1789–1799) Haitian Revolution (1791–1803)

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
